name: nativescript-swipe-view
description: NativeScript plugin to connect with Azure Notification Hubs

scripts.build: npm run ts-patch && npm run tsc
scripts.prepack: rimraf dist && npm run build && ncp ../README.md ./README.md && ncp ../LICENSE ./LICENSE
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-swipe-view && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios --bundle && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
